projects.title: SEQRSCAN: A Mobile Application for Phishing Attack Mitigation
projects.description: This was our final year capstone project at university, where we developed a functional mobile application using React Native and JavaScript. We followed Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) best practices within an agile environment to deliver rapid and efficient iterations throughout the project. As part of the development process, I designed and updated user interface layouts to meet both usability and performance standards. Additionally, I performed user experience (UX) quality assurance testing to identify issues and implement improvements, ensuring a smooth and user-friendly experience.
